# Problem 1

##The early_january_weather dataset
```{r}
data("early_january_weather")
mean(early_january_weather $ temp)
```

##A short description of the dataset

* We have 15 variables in this dataset, including origin  year month   day  hour  temp  dewp humid wind_dir wind_speed wind_gust precip.

* the size of the dataset is 358 rows * 15 cols

* the mean temperature is 39.58212
